text: Ezɨ Jehoram uan mɨdorozir gumazir dapaniba ko karis bar tuiva mɨsozir gumaziba inigha, Idomia mɨsoghasa zui. Me ghua otivizɨ, Idomian gumaziba iza Jehoramɨn mɨdorozir gumaziba ekɨarugha me mɨsoghasa. Ezɨ dɨmagarimɨn Jehoram mɨdorozir gumazir karisbar zuiba inigha, bar pamtem mɨsogha me adugha ghue.
